entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
